pages.text: /imm root : Can manipulate the player's spiritual roots. /imm spell : Can manipulate the player's spells. /imm experience : Can manipulate the player's cultivation level. /imm realm : Can manipulate the player's realm level. /imm data : Can manipulate the player's data. /imm element : Can manipulate the attachment of elements to entities. /imm tp : Can teleport quickly to other dimensions.
